ShortDescription.Value: Add a Super Expansion Upgrade to the Elementary School

Publish.LongDescription:
﻿## Super Elementary School Upgrade Asset Add a Super Expansion Upgrade to the Elementary School
### Warning: Assets are experimental. Please back up your save file before use. Known issues include: - Once your save uses these roads, removing the mod may cause white textures.
## Assets - Elementary School Upgrade - Super Elementary School Upgrade
## Localization - en-US - zh-HANS
## How to Use Install this mod and it will at Elementary School Upgrade
## Acknowledgment Special thanks to Konsi for the asset loading framework.
